items.sentence: Tom took a picture of his old camera with his new camera.
I asked Tom why he didn\'t want to go to the zoo with us.
If you go anywhere, you\'d better tell your mother first.
I think you should let Tom know that you don\'t like him.
We had a lot more fun in Boston than we thought we would.
We have more important things that need to be dealt with.
I\'ll do whatever it takes to keep my children in school.
I\'m going to make some coffee. Would you like some, too?
The last time I went to the beach, I got badly sunburned.
Tom was gunned down in the street in front of the church.
